modules.name: Between
modules.description: On trigger, out puts a random CV value between two values.

modules.name: Travel
modules.description: On trigger, take two samples and interpolate an output

modules.name: HiLo
modules.description: Given one or two inputs, output the maximum and minimum voltage.

modules.name: Some
modules.description: From a group of active inputs, when triggered, mute a number of the inputs, based on a probability

modules.name: Together
modules.description: An 8 channel, 4 group sequencer, with triggered randomized movement.

modules.name: Tumble
modules.description: A chain of up to 8 pulse countdowns, which can produce bursts of triggers or gates.

modules.name: Set
modules.description: Dual offset and scaling with CV control.

modules.name: Fork
modules.description: Provide two inputs and a probability/chance, will output one, when triggered.

modules.name: Some2
modules.description: On trigger, based on a CV input, between 0-n input is passed to outputs.

modules.name: Tap
modules.description: Three push buttons to control tree triggers and gates.

modules.name: Fork2
modules.description: Compare an input with a threshold and output one of two other inputs.

modules.name: Some3
modules.description: From a polyphonic input, when triggered, mute a number of the inputs, based on a probability

modules.name: Juice
modules.description: Select one of 16 sets of 8 fixed voltages, based on a CV input.

modules.name: Twinned2
modules.description: A sequencer with pair of 8 step notes, gates, randomisation and polyphonic input.

modules.name: Set2
modules.description: A single large knob with up to 4 presets and smooth interploation over a specified time.

modules.name: Any
modules.description: A simple AND/OR logic utility with 8 inputs, 1 output.
